metadata.title: CVE-2024-38561 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: kunit:Fix kthread reference There is a race condition when a kthread finishesafter the deadline and before the call to kthread_stop(), which may lead touse after free.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
